description:
Vovsoft Face Detector is an easy-to-use Windows application that allows you to automatically detect human faces in images using AI technology.

Vovsoft Face Detector is an easy-to-use Windows application that allows you to automatically detect human faces in images using AI technology. Whether you're working with a single photo or a large collection, the software supports batch processing and makes face detection simple.

You can add multiple image files by clicking the "Add Files" or "Add Folder" button, or simply drag and drop images into the interface. The software supports popular image formats, including PNG, JPG, BMP, and WEBP.

Key Features
- Mark Faces in Image: Automatically detect and highlight faces with bounding boxes in each image.
- Blur Faces in Image: Blur detected faces to protect privacy in photos and screenshots.
- Save Faces as Separate Images: Extract and save each detected face as a separate image file for further use.
- Export Face Positions: Export coordinates of detected face areas for use in other applications or analysis.

This program is ideal for anyone needing a fast and reliable face detection tool, from developers and researchers to photographers and privacy-conscious users.
